title: Airline ticket receipts and e-ticket confirmations
dataVerified: Passenger name, flight details, ticket number, fare, booking reference
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Ticket status (valid/used/refunded). Link to airline system (passenger and accounting, requires authentication)
rationale: OCR-to-hash for receipt/refund verification. Domain binding verifies airline. E-ticket receipt verification for expense claims, refunds, fare disputes. Prevents altered ticket receipts (inflated expense claims). QR code may be better for boarding passes which need instant scan speed.
